config.script:
state = self.props.selected
	if state:
		self.getSibling("StartDate").props.enabled = False
		self.getSibling("EndDate").props.enabled = False
		self.view.custom.Date.Enabled = False
	else:
		self.getSibling("StartDate").props.enabled = True
		self.getSibling("EndDate").props.enabled = True
		self.view.custom.Date.Enabled = True

config.expression:
runScript("mes.trace.sp.getParts", 0, 
	if({view.custom.Date.StartTime} = "", None, {view.custom.Date.StartTime}), // Start Date
	if({view.custom.Date.EndTime} = "", None, {view.custom.Date.EndTime}), // End Date
	if({view.custom.Label} = "" || {view.custom.Label} = "None", None, {view.custom.Label}), // Label
	False, //Label Exact Match
	if({view.custom.ProductCode} = "" || {view.custom.ProductCode} = "None", None, {view.custom.ProductCode}),//Product Code ID
	if({view.custom.Workorder} = "" || {view.custom.Workorder} = "None", None, {view.custom.Workorder}), //Workorder
	None, // InventoryID
	None, /// Accumulator ID
	False, //Get Completed Only
	False) /// Get WIP Only

///getParts(StartTime = None, EndTime = None, Label = None, LabelExactMatch = False, ProductCodeID = None, Workorder = None, InventoryID = None, AccumulatorID = None, GetCompletedOnly = False, GetWIPOnly = False):

transforms.code:
#options = [{ "label": "All", "value": ""  }]
	options = []
	pydata = system.dataset.toPyDataSet(value)
	
	for row in pydata:
		label = row["Label"]
		value = row["Label"]
		options.append({ "label": label, "value": label })
		
	return options

options = [{ "label": "All", "value": ""  }]
#	options = []
	pydata = system.dataset.toPyDataSet(value)
	
	for row in pydata:
		label = row["ProductCode"]
		value = row["ID"]
		options.append({ "label": label, "value": value })
		
	return options

options = [{ "label": "All", "value": ""  }]
	#options = []
	pydata = system.dataset.toPyDataSet(value)
	
	for row in pydata:
		label = row["Name"]
		value = row["ID"]
		options.append({ "label": label, "value": value })
		
	return options

options = [{ "label": "All", "value": ""  }]

	for row in pydata:
		label = row["Name"]
		value = row["ID"]

config.script:
startTime = self.props.value
		
#	self.view.params.StartTime = startTime
#	self.view.custom.Date.StartTime = startTime

endTime = self.props.value
	
#	self.view.params.EndTime = endTime
	self.view.custom.Date.EndTime = endTime

startDate = self.getSibling("StartDate").props.value
	endDate = self.getSibling("EndDate").props.value
	partID = self.parent.getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("PartIDEntry").props.text
	orderNumber = self.getSibling("OrderEntry").props.text
	productcode = self.getSibling("Dropdown").props.value
	testtypeid = self.getSibling("TestTypeDropdown").props.value
	teststatusid = self.getSibling("TestStatusDropdown").props.value
	
	self.view.custom.Date.StartTime = startDate
	self.view.custom.Date.EndTime = endDate
	self.view.custom.Label = partID
	self.view.custom.Workorder = orderNumber
	self.view.custom.ProductCode = productcode
	self.view.custom.TestTypeID = testtypeid
	self.view.custom.TestStatusID = teststatusid

config.script: self.parent.parent.getChild("Table").getChild("Table").props.selection.data = []

TestID = self.parent.parent.getChild("Table").getChild("Table").props.selection.data[0].ID
	mes.quality.sp.disableTest(TestID)
	
	
	self.parent.parent.getChild("Table").getChild("Table").props.selection.data = []
	
	messageType = 'refreshQualityTable' 
	payload = {}
	system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType, payload, view = 'session')

TestID = self.view.custom.SelectedTestID
	StatusName = 'Approved'
	ChangedBy = self.session.props.auth.user.userName
	if TestID > 0:
		mes.quality.sp.updateTestStatus(TestID, StatusName, ChangedBy)
		self.parent.parent.getChild("Table").getChild("Table").props.selection.data = []
	else:
		pass
	
	messageType = 'refreshQualityTable'
	payload = {}
	system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType, payload, view = 'session')

TestID = self.view.custom.SelectedTestID
	StatusName = 'Awaiting Review'
	ChangedBy = self.session.props.auth.user.userName
	if TestID > 0:
		mes.quality.sp.updateTestStatus(TestID, StatusName, ChangedBy)
		self.parent.parent.getChild("Table").getChild("Table").props.selection.data = []

	else:
		pass
	messageType = 'refreshQualityTable'
	payload = {}
	system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType, payload, view = 'session')

TestID = self.view.custom.SelectedTestID
	StatusName = 'Unapproved'
	ChangedBy = self.session.props.auth.user.userName
	if TestID > 0:
		mes.quality.sp.updateTestStatus(TestID, StatusName, ChangedBy)
		self.parent.parent.getChild("Table").getChild("Table").props.selection.data = []

	else:
		pass
	
	messageType = 'refreshQualityTable'
	payload = {}
	system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType, payload, view = 'session')

TestID = self.view.custom.SelectedTestID
	StatusName = 'On Hold'
	ChangedBy = self.session.props.auth.user.userName
	if TestID > 0:
		mes.quality.sp.updateTestStatus(TestID, StatusName, ChangedBy)
		self.parent.parent.getChild("Table").getChild("Table").props.selection.data = []

	else:
		pass
	
	messageType = 'refreshQualityTable'
	payload = {}
	system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType, payload, view = 'session')

TestID = self.view.custom.SelectedTestID
	StatusName = 'Incomplete'
	ChangedBy = self.session.props.auth.user.userName
	if TestID > 0:
		mes.quality.sp.updateTestStatus(TestID, StatusName, ChangedBy)
		self.parent.parent.getChild("Table").getChild("Table").props.selection.data = []

	else:
		pass
	
	messageType = 'refreshQualityTable'
	payload = {}
	system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType, payload, view = 'session')
